snippet: Lawyers for three men whose murder conviction of a livery-cab driver was reversed in October are asking a judge to set aside a second murder conviction or grant them a new trial.
abstract: Lawyers for Devon Ayers, Carlos Perez and Michael Cosme, whose murder conviction in 1995 shooting of livery-cab driver Baithe Diop was reversed in October, are asking a judge to set aside a second murder conviction or grant them a new trial; men were also convicted of killing Denise Raymond just days before Diop's death.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for three men whose murder conviction of a livery-cab driver was reversed in October are asking a judge to set aside a second murder conviction or grant them a new trial.

headline.seo: Three Still Jailed for ’95 Killing Seek a Second Reversal
headline.main: Cleared in One ’95 Killing, 3 Seek Reversal in Another
headline.print_headline: Cleared in One ’95 Killing, 3 Seek Reversal in Another
